sentences.sContent: Bolivia has arrested three other police officers suspected of helping him smuggle cocaine to the US.
sentences.sContent_eng: Bolivia has arrested three other police officers suspected of helping him smuggle cocaine to the US.
sentences.sCn: 玻利维亚还逮捕了其他三名涉嫌帮助他向美国走私可卡因的警察。

sentences.sContent: With no neighbouring countries and rigid customs controls at ports and airports, it will be difficult for anyone to smuggle in contraband cigarettes.
sentences.sContent_eng: With no neighbouring countries and rigid customs controls at ports and airports, it will be difficult for anyone to smuggle in contraband cigarettes.
sentences.sCn: 没有邻国，加之在海港和空港实行严格的海关监管，不管是谁，走私禁运品香烟都将是非常困难的事。

sentences.sContent: Ogden says the Justice Department will also investigate and prosecute those who smuggle guns and cash into Mexico.
sentences.sContent_eng: Ogden says the Justice Department will also investigate and prosecute those who smuggle guns and cash into Mexico.
sentences.sCn: 他说，司法部还将调查和起诉那些向墨西哥走私枪支和现金的人。

remMethod.val: 不断进行反对走私(smuggle)的斗争(struggle)

words.tran: 走私者；走私犯；[法] 走私船
